alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:22PM CST until December 15 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Adams County in west central Illinois... Northwestern Brown County in west central Illinois... North central Marion County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 922 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Quincy, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Camp Point and Golden around 940 PM CST. This includes Interstate 172 between exits 10 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
